message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL. 

The paper focuses on improving the matching accuracy between questions and answers in community-based Q&A services by overcoming the lexical gap. This involves integrating advantages of both the translation model and word embedding. The paper uses natural language processing techniques and machine learning algorithms to achieve this. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.CL (Computation and Language), cs.IR (Information Retrieval), and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, since the paper uses word embeddings, which are a popular technique in the field of artificial intelligence, the sub-categories cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.DL (Deep Learning) are also likely.
